pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of Holding$() is a unique sigil that can hold up to 5 other Sigils at a time, providing players with their passive effects.$(br2)Press [$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.open_holding)] while holding the $(item)Sigil of Holding$() to access its inventory.$(br2)To change the currently active sigil, you can [$(k:sneak)] and scroll up or down or use
[$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.cycle_holding_pos)] to move forward or [$(k:bloodmagic.keybind.cycle_holding_neg)] to move backward through the stored sigils.
